title: Revenue of the U.S. employee wellness market 2011 to 2016
summary: The timeline shows teh wellness of the U.S. employee worldwide in 2011 as well a forecast thereof for 2016 .
The source projected the wellness would increase from 1.45 to 2.9 billion U.S. dollars in the presented period .
gold: The statistic shows the revenue of the U.S. employee wellness market in 2011 provides a forecast for 2016.
1.45 billion U.S. dollars in total revenue was generated by the U.S. employee wellness market in 2011 .
